skill.name: planning-with-files
skill.description: Transforms workflow to use Manus-style persistent markdown files for planning, progress tracking, and knowledge storage. Use when starting complex tasks, multi-step projects, research tasks, or when the user mentions planning, organizing work, tracking progress, or wants structured output.

All 68 static findings are false positives: Claude tool examples were misidentified as shell commands, and common words triggered incorrect cryptographic warnings.

content.user_title: Organize complex AI tasks with persistent markdown files
content.value_statement: Complex AI tasks lose focus as context grows. This skill provides workflow patterns using persistent markdown files as external memory. Goals stay visible and progress is tracked throughout extended task execution.
actual_capabilities: Creates task_plan.md files with structured phases and progress tracking
Implements 3-file pattern for complex workflows (plan, notes, deliverable)
Provides templates for task planning, research notes, and error logging
Uses attention manipulation techniques from Manus AI methodology
Documents decisions, errors, and key questions for long-running tasks
limitations: Requires manual discipline to update files after each phase
No automatic progress synchronization with external systems
Benefits are most visible in multi-turn, complex task scenarios
File management depends on Claude tool availability

use_cases.title: Multi-phase debugging sessions
use_cases.description: Track complex bug investigations with persistent notes on code locations, error patterns, and fix attempts.

use_cases.title: Information synthesis tasks
use_cases.description: Organize research findings across multiple sources with structured notes and deliverable creation.

use_cases.title: Extended context management
use_cases.description: Maintain focus across 50+ tool calls by keeping goals visible through plan file re-reading.

prompt_templates.title: Start complex task
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a task_plan.md file with goal, phases, key questions, and status tracking for this project.

prompt_templates.title: Log progress
prompt_templates.prompt: Read task_plan.md, mark the current phase complete with [x], update status, and log any errors.

prompt_templates.title: Store research
prompt_templates.prompt: Create notes.md to store findings with sources and synthesized insights from this research.

prompt_templates.title: Deliver results
prompt_templates.prompt: Read task_plan.md and notes.md, then create the final deliverable file based on all completed work.

output_examples.input: Research and summarize the benefits of remote work
output: task_plan.md created with goal, phases, and key questions
notes.md populated with 4-5 research sources and findings
All phases tracked and marked complete in plan

output_examples.input: Debug the authentication failure in our login system
output: task_plan.md created with bug investigation phases
notes.md documenting error messages, code locations, and root cause analysis
Error log with resolution added to plan file

output_examples.input: Create a new feature for user dashboard analytics
output: task_plan.md with implementation phases and technical decisions
notes.md tracking design choices and API specifications
Final deliverable markdown with all changes explained

best_practices: Always create task_plan.md before starting complex work
Read the plan file before making major decisions
Store large content in files, not in context window
anti_patterns: Skipping plan file creation for complex tasks
Hiding errors instead of logging them with resolutions
Stuffing all information in context without external storage

faq.question: When should I use this skill?
faq.answer: Use for any task requiring 3+ tool calls, research projects, or work needing organization across sessions.

faq.question: What files does this create?
faq.answer: Create task_plan.md for tracking, notes.md for research, and a deliverable for final output.

faq.question: How does this help with long contexts?
faq.answer: By storing information externally and re-reading the plan, goals stay in the attention window.

faq.question: Can I customize the templates?
faq.answer: Yes, adapt templates while keeping core structure of goals, phases, and status tracking.

faq.question: What if something fails?
faq.answer: Log all errors in the plan file with resolutions. This builds knowledge for future tasks.

faq.question: Is this based on real research?
faq.answer: Yes, it implements context engineering principles from Manus AI, acquired by Meta in 2025.
